long_description: Slip on the Sanuk Baseline Shoes for strolls down the boardwalk this summer or a casual day at the office any time of year. Billed as a sandal-shoe hybrid from the Sanuk Sidewalk Surfer line, Baseline shoes are cotton canvas uppers on sandal bottoms. Subtle stretch gores offer slip-on ease and comfort. Loose-fitting uppers allow feet to move and spread for natural shock absorption and stability. EVA midsoles offer ample cushioning and a stable platform to walk on; soft EVA footbeds feature AEGIS(R) Microbe Shield antimicrobial additive to help deter odors. Rubber outsoles provide good traction. Sanuk Baseline Shoes are vegan friendly. Closeout.
short_description: Slip on the Sanuk Baseline Shoes for strolls down the boardwalk this summer or a casual day at the office any time of year.
